name: page-0bc68a83
page_data_script:
#test = frappe.session.user

test = "19hmdzabu@gmail.com"

usr = frappe.get_doc("Registration",{"mail":test})
if usr.mail == usr.student:
    frappe.msgprint("Dear Student")
    data.usr_type = frappe.get_all("Student Registration",{"student_email":test},["*"])
else:
    frappe.msgprint("Dear Parent")
    data.usr_type = frappe.get_all("Student Registration",{"parent_email":test},["*"])
    #data.usr_type =[usr]





usr = frappe.get_doc("Registration",{"mail":test})
tx_ref = usr.tx_ref

# Verify payment with Chapa
endpoint = f"https://api.chapa.co/v1/transaction/verify/{tx_ref}"
secret = frappe.get_doc("Chapa Settings").get_password("secret_key")
headers = {'Authorization': f'Bearer {secret}'}


response = frappe.make_get_request(endpoint, headers=headers)
#print(response.get("status"))
    #response.raise_for_status()  # Raise error for HTTP failures
#except Exception as e:
    #frappe.log_error(f"Chapa API Error: {str(e)}")
    #frappe.throw("Payment verification failed. Please try again later.")

# Parse and validate response
if response.get("status") == "success":
    payment_data = response.get("data", {})
    
    if payment_data.get("status") == "success":
        # Update registration document
        reg_doc = frappe.get_doc("Student Registration", tx_ref)
        
        # Update payment details
        reg_doc.db_set({
            "State": "Paid"
            #"amount_paid": payment_data.get("amount"),
            #"payment_reference": payment_data.get("reference"),
            #"payment_date": payment_data.get("created_at"),
            #"chapa_response": frappe.as_json(response)  # Store full response for reference
        })
        
        frappe.db.commit()
        
        batch_check = frappe.get_doc("LMS Batch Enrollment", {"member":usr.student})
        if batch_check.batch == reg_doc.grade:
           frappe.msgprint("Student {usr.student} subscription extended!")
        else:
            batch = frappe.new_doc("LMS Batch Enrollment")
            batch.member = usr.student
            batch.batch = reg_doc.grade
            batch.save(ignore_permissions=True)
        
        frappe.msgprint("Payment verified successfully!")
        #student_mail = usr.student
        data.reg = [frappe.get_doc("Student Registration", tx_ref)]
    else:
        frappe.msgprint(f"Payment failed: {payment_data.get('status')}")
else:
    frappe.msgprint(f"Verification failed: {response.get('message')}")
